# Assignment 13 - Fix The Code

### Task
Fix the code to make it works correctly.

---

### Provided Code
```cpp
int main()
{
  // Edit Here To Fix The Error
  const int current_year;
  const int birth_year;

  // Do Not Edit Here
  current_year = 2022;
  birth_year = 1982;
  int age_in_years = current_year - birth_year;
  cout << age_in_years;
  return 0;
}
```
